array.string: <b:t>There are 3 feet in 1 yard. Fill in the gaps.</b:t>
<b:on number="3" suffix=" feet"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on number="1" suffix=" yard"/>
<b:on number="15" suffix=" feet"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on usePicker="yes" pickerTarget="5" suffix=" yards"/>
<b:on usePicker="yes" pickerTarget="27" suffix=" feet" /><b:oo value="=" /><b:on number="9" suffix=" yards"/>
<b:on usePicker="yes" pickerTarget="18" suffix=" feet"/><b:oo value="=" /><b:on number="6" suffix=" yards"/>
